00022 #ifndef __COMMANDTARGETS__
00023 #define __COMMANDTARGETS__

00025 #include <wx/string.h>

00027 #include <wx/statusbr.h>

00032 class CommandProgressTarget
00033 {
00034 public:
00035    virtual ~CommandProgressTarget() {}
00036    virtual void Update(double completed) = 0;
00037 };
00038 
00040 class NullProgressTarget : public CommandProgressTarget
00041 {
00042 public:
00043    virtual ~NullProgressTarget() {}
00044    virtual void Update(double completed) {}
00045 };
00046 
00048 class GUIProgressTarget : public CommandProgressTarget
00049 {
00050 private:
00051    ProgressDialog &mProgress;
00052 public:
00053    GUIProgressTarget(ProgressDialog &pd)
00054       : mProgress(pd)
00055    {}
00056    virtual ~GUIProgressTarget() {}
00057    virtual void Update(double completed)
00058    {
00059       mProgress.Update(completed);
00060    }
00061 };
00062 
00064 class CommandMessageTarget
00065 {
00066 public:
00067    virtual ~CommandMessageTarget() {}
00068    virtual void Update(wxString message) = 0;
00069 };
00070 
00072 class ProgressToMessageTarget : public CommandProgressTarget
00073 {
00074 private:
00075    CommandMessageTarget &mTarget;
00076 public:
00077    ProgressToMessageTarget(CommandMessageTarget *target)
00078       : mTarget(*target)
00079    { }
00080    virtual ~ProgressToMessageTarget()
00081    {
00082       // delete &mTarget;
00083    }
00084    virtual void Update(double completed)
00085    {
00086       mTarget.Update(wxString::Format(wxT("%.2f%%"), completed*100));
00087    }
00088 };
00089 
00091 class NullMessageTarget : public CommandMessageTarget
00092 {
00093 public:
00094    virtual ~NullMessageTarget() {}
00095    virtual void Update(wxString message) {}
00096 };
00097 
00099 class MessageBoxTarget : public CommandMessageTarget
00100 {
00101 public:
00102    virtual ~MessageBoxTarget() {}
00103    virtual void Update(wxString message)
00104    {
00105       wxMessageBox(message);
00106    }
00107 };
00108 
00110 class StatusBarTarget : public CommandMessageTarget
00111 {
00112 private:
00113    wxStatusBar &mStatus;
00114 public:
00115    StatusBarTarget(wxStatusBar &sb)
00116       : mStatus(sb)
00117    {}
00118    virtual void Update(wxString message)
00119    {
00120       mStatus.SetStatusText(message);
00121    }
00122 };
00123 
00125 class ResponseQueueTarget : public CommandMessageTarget
00126 {
00127 private:
00128    ResponseQueue &mResponseQueue;
00129 public:
00130    ResponseQueueTarget(ResponseQueue &responseQueue)
00131       : mResponseQueue(responseQueue)
00132    { }
00133    virtual ~ResponseQueueTarget()
00134    {
00135       mResponseQueue.AddResponse(wxString(wxT("\n")));
00136    }
00137    virtual void Update(wxString message)
00138    {
00139       mResponseQueue.AddResponse(message);
00140    }
00141 };
00142 
00144 class CombinedMessageTarget : public CommandMessageTarget
00145 {
00146 private:
00147    CommandMessageTarget *m1, *m2;
00148 public:
00149    CombinedMessageTarget(CommandMessageTarget *t1, CommandMessageTarget *t2)
00150       : m1(t1), m2(t2)
00151    {
00152       wxASSERT(t1 != NULL);
00153       wxASSERT(t2 != NULL);
00154    }
00155    ~CombinedMessageTarget()
00156    {
00157       delete m1;
00158       delete m2;
00159    }
00160    virtual void Update(wxString message)
00161    {
00162       m1->Update(message);
00163       m2->Update(message);
00164    }
00165 };
00166 
00167 
00168 // By default, we ignore progress updates but display all other messages directly
00169 class TargetFactory
00170 {
00171 public:
00172    static CommandProgressTarget *ProgressDefault()
00173    {
00174       return CreateProgressTarget<NullProgressTarget>();
00175    }
00176 
00177    static CommandMessageTarget *MessageDefault()
00178    {
00179       return CreateMessageTarget<MessageBoxTarget>();
00180    }
00181 
00182    template<typename T>
00183    static CommandProgressTarget *CreateProgressTarget()
00184    {
00185       return (new T);
00186    }
00187 
00188    template<typename T>
00189    static CommandMessageTarget *CreateMessageTarget()
00190    {
00191       return (new T);
00192    }
00193 
00194 };
00195 
00198 class CommandOutputTarget
00199 {
00200 private:
00201    CommandProgressTarget *mProgressTarget;
00202    CommandMessageTarget *mStatusTarget;
00203    CommandMessageTarget *mErrorTarget;
00204 public:
00205    CommandOutputTarget(CommandProgressTarget *pt = TargetFactory::ProgressDefault(),
00206                        CommandMessageTarget  *st = TargetFactory::MessageDefault(),
00207                        CommandMessageTarget  *et = TargetFactory::MessageDefault())
00208       : mProgressTarget(pt), mStatusTarget(st), mErrorTarget(et)
00209    { }
00210    ~CommandOutputTarget()
00211    {
00212       delete mProgressTarget;
00213       if (mErrorTarget != mStatusTarget)
00214          delete mStatusTarget;
00215       delete mErrorTarget;
00216    }
00217    void Progress(double completed)
00218    {
00219       if (mProgressTarget)
00220          mProgressTarget->Update(completed);
00221    }
00222    void Status(wxString status)
00223    {
00224       if (mStatusTarget)
00225          mStatusTarget->Update(status);
00226    }
00227    void Error(wxString message)
00228    {
00229       if (mErrorTarget)
00230          mErrorTarget->Update(message);
00231    }
00232 };
